## CharityORG.luckyCancel() method

Performs a lucky cancel

**Signature:**

```typescript
luckyCancel(Event_Name: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Event\_Name | string | Name of Event |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if successful, False if not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 4 GB

Performs a lucky cancel on an event if you are able to. Costs 1 Lucky Coin and requires that a valid event name. Events cancelled in this way do not activate their death effects.
